description.zh-cn: 战国末年秦国人物，秦始皇母亲赵姬的面首。因与赵姬通奸生子并企图发动政变而被车裂、夷三族。
description.en: A figure in the late Warring States period of the State of Qin, and a lover of Queen Dowager Zhao, the mother of Qin Shi Huang. He was executed by dismemberment by carriage and his clan was exterminated for having an illicit affair with the Queen Dowager, fathering two sons with her, and attempting a coup d'état.

description.zh-cn: 中国首位皇帝，战国时期秦国君主。下令彻查并处决了嫪毐。
description.en: The first emperor of China and the king of the State of Qin during the Warring States period. He ordered the investigation and execution of Lao Ai.

description.zh-cn: 秦始皇的母亲，秦庄襄王的王后。与吕不韦及嫪毐私通。
description.en: Mother of Qin Shi Huang and queen consort of King Zhuangxiang of Qin. She had illicit affairs with Lü Buwei and Lao Ai.

description.zh-cn: 战国末期秦国丞相、商人。他将嫪毐献给赵姬，后又参与平定嫪毐之乱。
description.en: A chancellor and merchant of the State of Qin in the late Warring States period. He presented Lao Ai to Queen Dowager Zhao and later participated in suppressing Lao Ai's rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 战国末期秦国大臣，受秦王政之命率兵平定嫪毐之乱。
description.en: A minister of the State of Qin in the late Warring States period, who was ordered by King Zheng of Qin to lead troops to suppress Lao Ai's rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 战国末期秦国大臣，受秦王政之命率兵平定嫪毐之乱。
description.en: A minister of the State of Qin in the late Warring States period, who was ordered by King Zheng of Qin to lead troops to suppress Lao Ai's rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 秦始皇的弟弟。曾发动叛乱，有观点认为嫪毐因平定其叛乱而封侯。
description.en: The younger brother of Qin Shi Huang. He once launched a rebellion, and some believe Lao Ai was enfeoffed for suppressing it.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上周朝的诸侯国，战国七雄之一。
description.en: A vassal state of the Zhou Dynasty in ancient China, and one of the Seven Warring States.

description.zh-cn: 秦国授予嫪毐的爵位。
description.en: A marquisate title bestowed upon Lao Ai by the State of Qin.

description.zh-cn: 嫪毐为假宦官事发后，伪造印信，率叛军攻击蕲年宫的政变，最终失败。
description.en: After his identity as a fake eunuch was exposed, Lao Ai forged seals and led rebel troops to attack Qinian Palace in a coup d'état that ultimately failed.

description.zh-cn: 秦王政八年，王弟成𫊸所部发动的叛乱。
description.en: A rebellion launched by the troops of Lord Chengjiao, the king's younger brother, in the eighth year of King Zheng of Qin's reign.

description.zh-cn: 秦汉时期的郡，位于今河南濮阳市一带，为嫪毐的出生地。
description.en: A commandery during the Qin and Han dynasties, located in the area of modern-day Puyang, Henan, and the birthplace of Lao Ai.

description.zh-cn: 秦国都城，嫪毐在此地被处以车裂之刑。
description.en: The capital city of the State of Qin, where Lao Ai was executed by dismemberment by carriage.

description.zh-cn: 秦国宫殿，嫪毐发动叛乱时攻击的目标。
description.en: A palace in the State of Qin that was the target of Lao Ai's attack during his rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 西汉史学家司马迁撰写的纪传体史书，是记载嫪毐事迹的主要史料来源。
description.en: A biographical history book written by the Western Han historian Sima Qian, which is the main historical source for the events concerning Lao Ai.

description.zh-cn: 明朝末年的长篇历史演义小说，其中包含关于嫪毐的描绘。
description.en: A lengthy historical novel from the late Ming Dynasty that includes depictions of Lao Ai.

description.zh-cn: 嫪毐是赵姬的面首，与其通奸并生下两个儿子。
description.en: Lao Ai was the lover of Queen Dowager Zhao, with whom he had an illicit affair and fathered two sons.

description.zh-cn: 在秦王嬴政年长后，吕不韦为避免与太后赵姬通奸事发惹祸上身，将嫪毐介绍给她。
description.en: After King Zheng of Qin grew older, Lü Buwei, fearing trouble from his ongoing affair with Queen Dowager Zhao, introduced Lao Ai to her.

description.zh-cn: 吕不韦将嫪毐收入府中作为舍人，之后才将其献给赵姬。
description.en: Lü Buwei took Lao Ai into his residence as a retainer before presenting him to Queen Dowager Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 吕不韦为断绝与赵姬的私情，将嫪毐设计送入宫中服侍赵姬。
description.en: To end his affair with Queen Dowager Zhao, Lü Buwei arranged for Lao Ai to be sent into the palace to serve her.

description.zh-cn: 赵姬是秦始皇的母亲。
description.en: Queen Dowager Zhao was the mother of Qin Shi Huang.

description.zh-cn: 公元前239年，嫪毐获封长信侯。
description.en: In 239 BC, Lao Ai was enfeoffed as the Marquess of Changxin.

description.zh-cn: 嫪毐听闻其假宦官身份及与太后私通之事败露，遂伪造印信，率叛军发动政变。
description.en: Upon learning that his identity as a fake eunuch and his affair with the Queen Dowager had been exposed, Lao Ai forged seals and led rebel troops to launch a coup.

description.zh-cn: 嫪毐发动兵变意图杀害秦王政，并立自己的儿子为王。
description.en: Lao Ai launched a military coup with the intention of killing King Zheng of Qin and installing his own son as king.

description.zh-cn: 嫪毐率领的叛军攻击了蕲年宫。
description.en: The rebel army led by Lao Ai attacked Qinian Palace.

description.zh-cn: 秦王政下令彻查嫪毐，并命令吕不韦、昌平君、昌文君率兵平定叛乱。
description.en: King Zheng of Qin ordered a thorough investigation of Lao Ai and commanded Lü Buwei, Lord Changping, and Lord Changwen to lead troops to suppress the rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 吕不韦受秦王政之命率兵平定嫪毐之乱。
description.en: Under the order of King Zheng of Qin, Lü Buwei led troops to suppress Lao Ai's rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 昌平君受秦王政之命率兵平定嫪毐之乱。
description.en: Under the order of King Zheng of Qin, Lord Changping led troops to suppress Lao Ai's rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 昌文君受秦王政之命率兵平定嫪毐之乱。
description.en: Under the order of King Zheng of Qin, Lord Changwen led troops to suppress Lao Ai's rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 在嫪毐之乱失败后，秦始皇下令将嫪毐车裂处死，夷其三族，并将嫪毐与太后所生的两个儿子囊扑杀之。
description.en: After the failure of Lao Ai's rebellion, Qin Shi Huang ordered Lao Ai to be executed by dismemberment by carriage, his clan to be exterminated up to the third degree, and his two sons with the Queen Dowager to be beaten to death in sacks.

description.zh-cn: 秦王政的弟弟成𫊸发动了叛乱。
description.en: Chengjiao, the younger brother of King Zheng of Qin, launched a rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 根据一种历史假说，嫪毐可能是因为负责平定成𫊸叛乱而获得封侯之赏赐。
description.en: According to a historical hypothesis, Lao Ai may have been rewarded with a marquisate for his role in suppressing the rebellion of Lord Chengjiao.

description.zh-cn: 嫪毐出生于东郡。
description.en: Lao Ai was born in Dong Commandery.
